page.title: 18INTERVIEWS
page.content: Whilst looking around our area, we interviewed several locals and asked about their views on topics which concern them:this was what they told us. The first person spoken to lived at 1, Little Hill Cottages,Wicken. She said that she had lived there for fourteen years and as she can't drive she doesn't go out very often.She said that there had been a{petition}to get a minibus to take people like her to Buckingham.Her husband worked at the farm across the road. At the farm she spoke of, called Little Hill Farm.The farmer has a livestock of sheep,cows and pigs.He said that he liked living there.He said that there had been a lot of changes in the last ten years,due to the presence of Milton Keynes. { }
